import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import Card from '../components/Card'; const Contact = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '', }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value, })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle form submission here console.log('Form submitted:', formData); // Reset form setFormData({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '', }); }; const containerVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0 }, visible: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.2 } } }; const itemVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0, y: 30 }, visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0, transition: { duration: 0.6, ease: "easeOut" } } }; return (
